moves.1. Nc3: I game where I get a nice attack that leads to an early checkmate. Of course my opponent did make mistakes.
moves.1... d5 2. d4 Nf6 3. h3: Not wanting a Bg4, but white needs to work on development on move 3
moves.3... e6 4. Be3: Opening my dsb, blocking my lsb, but the action is on the queen side.
moves.6. Kd2: ?? My opponent believes that castling is weak for his king. I'm going to show him all the reasons this move is wrong.
moves.7. a3 exd4: Winning a pawn and forking his knight and bishop
moves.9... Nf5 10. Qe1: Looking to get his queen in play maybe?
moves.11. Ne4 Nxe4+ 12. fxe4 Qg5+ 13. Kd3: Kd8 was met with Ne3+ and a discovered check on the next move which would be deadly to white, but even that is better than this.
moves.15. Kb5 a6+ 16. Ka4 Bd7+ 17. b5 Bxb5+ 18: The good check I could find
moves.20. Kd5 Qd4#: Hope you enjoyed this little mating attack.

gameName: Quick Mate after early king move.
